name: Vision 2020
description:
You, the player, control a sock puppet that has traveled back in time to the beginning of 2020 to prevent (or cause) several disasters. Using your 2020 vision (knowledge of 2020 since you already lived it), your 'hindsight', you can save the world.

TO PLAY THE GAME

Open Matlab. Open the file called "Vision2020TreeDouser.mlapp".

Hit Run

Get paid
